title: Why I shouldn't be Banned
body:
Riot has previously banned me for using a Third Party Program. However, I have friends who know my account, and almost everybody who I have played against, who can testify the contrary. The only programs that were installed on my computer that relate to League of Legends are Curse by Curse Inc, and Championify, a program that makes item sets for you. Riot apparently approves and even encourages players to use these programs as tools to help in gameplay. Also, on a previous discussion on the boards, I had a friend inform me that Third Party Programs aren't something you can accidentally install, as they are fully automated bots, or some other programs are map changers or macros, which I have neither. While some argue I may be lying about the bots, I am only in Bronze III, shown on op.gg, and have an mmr that enforces that. The Third Party Programs can get players up to much higher elos- even to Diamond! On my match history, I have a decent history that reflects my level of skill. If you watch the replays, you will also see that I do react fast on some occasions, but most of the time I mess up. Third Party Programs give advantages to players that will help fix mess ups like my own. Therefore, this is why I should not be banned, because I am innocent of any usage of scripts, macros, map changers, or any other Third Party Programs due to the reasons above. Maybe the system made a mistake, as my friend was once banned for the same reason, and he was completely innocent of Third Party Programs as well.

Search up: OGBleach
On the NA server on op.gg if you don't believe me.

You had friends on your account.  That's honestly enough for a ban if you take the time to read over the terms and conditions.
No I had friends who knew my account, not friends on my account posing as me.
